publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1755 Robert Brown: Evening Times War on Litter Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Evening Times for its War on Litter campaign; notes that War on Litter came runner-up for Campaign of the Year at the recent Scottish Press Awards; commends the Evening Times for the long-running campaign, particularly for its work in discouraging the dropping of litter and fly-tipping and encouraging civic pride throughout Glasgow, and recognises the role that the Evening Times has played in campaigning on behalf of the people of Glasgow to clean up the city.

S3M-1755 Evening Times War on Litter Campaign (lodged on 22 April 2008) Andy Kerr*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Hume*, Bill Butler*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie Stone*, Trish Godman*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jim Tolson*, Bob Doris*, Charlie Gordon*, Patrick Harvie*, Johann Lamont*, Robin Harper*, Karen Gillon*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-1755 Evening Times War on Litter Campaign (lodged on 22 April 2008) Elaine Smith*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-1755 Robert Brown: Evening Times War on Litter Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates the Evening Times for its War on Litter campaign; notes that War on Litter came runner-up for Campaign of the Year at the recent Scottish Press Awards; commends the Evening Times for the long-running campaign, particularly for its work in discouraging the dropping of litter and fly-tipping and encouraging civic pride throughout Glasgow, and recognises the role that the Evening Times has played in campaigning on behalf of the people of Glasgow to clean up the city. Supported by: Andy Kerr, Kenneth Gibson, Jim Hume, Bill Butler, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Hugh O’Donnell, Jamie Stone, Trish Godman, Elizabeth Smith, Nanette Milne, Bashir Ahmad, Jim Tolson, Bob Doris, Charlie Gordon, Patrick Harvie, Johann Lamont, Robin Harper, Karen Gillon, Mike Pringle, Elaine Smith, Sandra White, Gil Paterson
S3M-1755 Evening Times War on Litter Campaign (lodged on 22 April 2008) Ross Finnie*
